name: Blaze
headline: Marketing automation for the modern world
description: Blaze uses AI and automation to scan millions of online signals to help modern companies target the right potential customers as soon as they show interest.

founders.name: Lauren Rothwell, Founder
founders.description: Lauren is the co-founder and CEO of Blaze. Lauren grew up in Ireland, and started her career on the trading floor of Goldman Sachs in London. Fascinated by the fintech revolution she was witnessing, she moved to Silicon Valley to get closer to where all the magic happened. She worked in product at several start ups before launching Blaze. Lauren has an MBA from Stanford Graduate School of Business and a degree in Economics and Statistics from Trinity College Dublin.

founders.name: Chirag Mahapatra, Founder
founders.description: Chirag is a co-founder and CTO of Blaze. Previously, he was an Engineering Manager at Facebook in the Growth org working on problems in privacy, infrastructure and data. Prior to this, he was led the Membership and Authentication Infra teams at Airbnb. He also had stints in the Identity and Risk teams while there solving problems in ML. He joined Airbnb as part of an acquisition of a ML startup, Trooly. Chirag has a graduate degree from UC Berkeley and undergraduate degree from NITK.

# Marketing is hard. Blaze makes it easy.
Blaze uses AI and automation to scan millions of online signals to help modern companies target the right potential customers as soon as they show interest.
[Select a workflow](https://withblaze.app/</feature-store>)[Try for free](https://withblaze.app/<https:/dashboard.withblaze.app/signup/>)

Experience Blaze: Interactive Demo
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/667442d5a3231f9232ecd70f_infog_b2b_ai_signals.png)
# Generate leads with AI-powered signals
Leverage better intent signals by scanning social, news and public financials to find who is interested in your service now. Know who's evaluating your competitors, investing heavily in AI, or announced a relevant strategy pivot, without the hard research work.
# Generate leads with AI-powered signals
Leverage better intent signals by scanning social, news and public financials to find who is interested in your service now. Know who's evaluating your competitors, investing heavily in ML, or announced a relevant strategy pivot, without the hard research work.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/667442d5a3231f9232ecd70f_infog_b2b_ai_signals.png)
# Send relevant outreach on diverse channels
Generate personalized messages and collateral for each lead and reach users with hyper relevant outreach through DMs on LinkedIn and X or email.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/667442d629cd26d6689418d3_infog_b2b_measure.png)

# Leverage community data to understand your user intent
Harness the power of community data to gain deep insights into your users' intentions. By understanding user intent, you can tailor your products and services to meet their expectations, enhance engagement, and foster loyalty.

## Designed for Modern Marketers 
Explore our comprehensive suite of tools for all your lead generation needs.
### Curate Segments for Targeting
![Automated Reports - Darkbit X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf55794efbc025e32_icon-3-features-section-darkbit-template.svg)

Tap into our database of more than 40M users

Build segments based on social signals such as who follows competitors, mentions keywords in their post or profile, or has a certain job title

Find users based on on-chain signals such as who holds specific tokens 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/645855543b78b771a06d3d48_users.png)
### Engage and Retain Users 
![Team Work - Darkbit X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf55794bf49025e7c_icon-5-values-darkbit-template.svg)

Robustly manage community channels and content calendars on Discord and Twitter

Build onboarding and engagement workflows

Segment and communicate with users through DM and email
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/645834d178faaa03f5f7330e_discord%20mgmt.png)
### Target and Convert Users
![Demographics - Darkbit X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf55794273e025ef4_icon-1-feature-single-darkbit-template.svg)

Automate your outreach efforts by enrolling leads in DM and email sequences 

Run highly targeted paid campaigns directed at leads with your ideal customer profile
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/63f05195ad117eb7ddbd6781_optimised_campaigns.webp)
### Attribute and Analyze
![Advanced Analytics - Darkbit X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf557940016025e51_icon-1-features-section-darkbit-template.svg)

Accurately track your community, social media, transaction, and product data

Understand which campaigns to allocate more budget to
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/63f05050b5f34fa2bc10fa1e_optimised_analytics_4_panels.webp)

## How do I get started?
Blaze centralizes your community and transaction data to help you build and measure cross-platform marketing campaigns that power acquisition, activation, loyalty and retention.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/63f05258e2860cae4142d494_optimised_3steps.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf55794079a025f2e_ic_design.png)
### 1. Create a free account and integrate your tools
Pull in your social channels and add your team mates.
![Live Reports - Darkbit X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf557947b40025e2d_icon-2-tools-darkbit-template.svg)
### 2. Implement your growth plan
Segment your users based on their social media, community and on-chain activity. Evaluate which marketing, community and content strategies are bringing in the right kind of users.
![Start Tracking Your Website - Darkbit X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf55794316b025e2b_icon-3-steps-darkbit-template.svg)
### 3. Analyze your resutls
Evaluate which marketing, community and content strategies are bringing in the right kind of users.
[Schedule a demo](https://withblaze.app/<https:/calendly.com/blaze-ai/demo?utm_source=website&utm_medium=home>)
## Save time with the Blaze API 
Easily connect your social data to other revenue events through the Blaze API. Quantifying ROI of organic strategies has never been simpler.
[Schedule a demo](https://withblaze.app/<https:/calendly.com/blaze-ai/demo?utm_source=website&utm_medium=home>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/63f04e4eee661990c0dc8f54_optimised_API2.webp)
## Visit our Blaze blog
Check out our blog to learn more about marketing for community driven companies.
[![Steps to Convert Social Media Activity into Lead Generation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf5579448c8025df0/66cdf4b9e5b050ff05c15c80_Steps%20to%20Convert%20Social%20Media%20Activity%20into%20Lead%20Generation.webp)![Chirag Mahapatra](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf5579448c8025df0/63f0b63763ea2204271d90cd_ezgif.com-gif-maker-3.webp)Chirag MahapatraAugust 27, 2024Steps to Convert Social Media Activity into Lead GenerationLearn more](https://withblaze.app/</blog/lead-conversion-from-social-media-signals>)

## How do I get started?
Blaze centralizes your community and transaction data to help you build and measure cross-platform marketing campaigns that power acquisition, activation, loyalty and retention.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/63f05258e2860cae4142d494_optimised_3steps.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/631956eaf557947f61025dc2/631956eaf55794079a025f2e_ic_design.png)
### 1. Create a free account and integrate your tools
Pull in your social channels and add your team mates.
![Live Reports - Darkbit X Webflow TemplateâŸ¨30âŸ©]
### 2. Implement your growth plan
Segment your users based on their social media, community and on-chain activity. Evaluate which marketing, community and content strategies are bringing in the right kind of users.
![Start Tracking Your Website - Darkbit X Webflow TemplateâŸ¨31âŸ©]
### 3. Analyze your resutls
Evaluate which marketing, community and content strategies are bringing in the right kind of users.

generated_description:
**Blaze: Revolutionizing Marketing Automation with AI**

Founded in 2022 and rooted in San Francisco, Blaze is making waves in the marketing automation space. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, it's clear this innovative startup is putting its AI-powered technology to the test.

### The Mission

Blaze aims to simplify marketing automation for modern businesses. Their magic lies in harnessing AI to sift through millions of online signals, enabling companies to reach potential customers precisely when they're showing interest. The result? A more targeted, efficient approach to lead generation.

### What They Do

Blaze provides a comprehensive suite of tools designed for todayâ€™s B2B marketers, including:

- **Workflows**: Streamlined processes that integrate with various marketing functions.
- **Lead Generation**: Identifying high-intent leads based on analyses of social media, on-chain data, and more.
- **Community Growth**: Facilitating engagement through targeted campaigns on platforms like Discord and Twitter.
- **Personalized Outreach**: Its platform enables tailored messaging to potential leads across multiple channels.

For businesses dealing with B2B marketing, AI, and blockchain technologies, Blaze offers specialized solutions to fine-tune marketing strategies.

### Current Offerings

Visit their [website](https://withblaze.app) to explore their features, case studies, pricing plans, and playbooks aimed at maximizing your marketing impact. You can experiment with their platform for free, making it accessible for businesses of all sizes to dive into the automation space.

### Why Blaze Stands Out

Blaze isn't just another SaaS offering; it's a partner in growth, emphasizing real-time customer engagement and decisions powered by data. With a small but robust team of 10 and a solid group partner in Nan, this company has quickly earned the trust of over 100 leading firms. 

From startups to established enterprises, Blazeâ€™s tools help marketers focus their efforts where they matter mostâ€”on high-quality leads that translate into sales.

### Conclusion

In a world where marketing is often complicated and noisy, Blaze cuts through the clutter. It promises to make marketing less of a headache and more of a streamlined process. Whether youâ€™re just starting or looking to enhance your existing marketing automation, Blaze could very well be the solution you need to ignite growth. Explore their offerings today and see how they can transform your marketing efforts into a more effective operation.
